RT @fernhilldammit: @LeighNaturkach My philanthropic year: @AbortionRights @oxfamcanada @Interval_House @DailyBreadTO @StStephensHouse @Torâ€¦

The marches, petitions, protests and community events I have been inspired by and those I have been involved with give me the fuel needed to continue onward in the year ahead. Sending big love to those organizers and galvanizers. Your work is invaluable!
Iâ€™d love to hear what other people supported - philanthropy can look like many things - time, wisdom, energy, networks, and more.

Itâ€™s been wonderful to see the work of these organizations and individuals move the dial on issues and topics important to me, my values, our communities, and equity. Hereâ€™s to more support for each and the great minds and hearts behind them in 2019!

My philanthropic year: @wchf @DWDCanada ArrabonHouse @actioncanadashr @AbortionRights @HBKidsHospital @Caringsociety @CLEWcanada @AWHL @AlzCanada @CanadasLifeline @aclu @MsMagazine @guardian Society of Sharing @anne_theriault Steph Guthrie @TiffanyFordTO @m_layton @kristynwongtam
